attributes.action: Enforce a joint initiative for all ISPs to share, block and shut down creators of SPAM, PHISHING and VIRAL Emails, Servers and Sites
attributes.additional_details: Increased powers for ALL ISPs with a shared joint initiative alliance with leading Internet Protection Software Companies and Internet Crime Digital Fraud Units to monitor, block and shut down all creators and sources of SPAM, VIRUSES, PHISHING EMAILS, TROJANS and SPYBOTS.
